version_description:
5.0.3
When we launched Bria Mobile, we introduced HD video, and users have loved their HD calls. In fact, its been so popular that many users wanted it to be on HD by default. As well, some users wanted to be able to select different resolutions for Mobile and WiFi networks, to be able to use the best option for the network. We're happy to announce that this version now offers both options. We've turned on HD Video by default for new installs for both Wifi and Cell calls on iPhone 6S+ and iPad Air 2+.

· HD (720p) video resolution default (iPhone 6S+ and iPad Air 2+)
· Ability to specify video resolution by network type
· Call continuity improvements for Bria Push Service
· Stability and performance improvements

Fix for Bria Push Service setting visibility.

Additional stability and performance improvements.

Bria Mobile 5.1.1

iPhone X Support
iOS 11.1 Support
Improved support for Bria Push Service
User Interface updates
Spotlight Search integration
Improved Siri support
256-bit SRTP encryption support

Stability and performance improvements.

Bria Mobile 5.1.2

Video interoperability improvement

Bria Mobile 5.1.3

Background support improvements.

A reminder to use our Bria Push Service. You can now exit the app to save battery and network traffic and we will still deliver your incoming calls reliably.

Go to Settings > Accounts > SIP Account > Account Specific Features and enable Use Push Notifications.
​
For more detail on the Bria Push Service, please visit https://support.counterpath.com/knowledge-base/article/bria-mobile-push-checklist

Bria Mobile 5.2.1

Hyperlink Previews can now be disabled in Preferences
Bria Push Service now supports TCP and TLS plus improved performance worldwide.

For more detail on the Bria Push Service, please visit https://support.counterpath.com/knowledge-base/article/bria-mobile-push-checklist

Bria Mobile 5.2.2.40888

TCP backgrounding support improvement
Additional minor fixes and stability improvements.

For more detail on the Bria Push Service, please visit https://support.counterpath.com/hc/en-us/articles/115004151013-Bria-Mobile-Push-Checklist

Bria Mobile 5.2.3

iOS backgrounding improvements

For more detail on the Bria Push Service, please visit https://support.counterpath.com/hc/en-us/articles/115004151013-Bria-Mobile-Push-Checklist

Bria Mobile 5.3.1

Contact Suggestions - the dialer now shows matches of your contacts as you dial
Now supporting XMPP file transfer. Share an image, a document, or other files directly from within Bria Mobile. Requires iOS 11.
Split view support on iPad. Requires iOS 11.
Audible alert when network lost.
Trial period increased to 14 days.

Bria Mobile Ringtone and Alert Text tones will be reset. Due to a change in the way custom Ringtones and Alert Text tones are stored in Bria Mobile, these tones will be reset to Bria Mobile's default tone after upgrading to this version. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

For more detail on the Bria Push Service, please visit https://support.counterpath.com/hc/en-us/articles/115004151013-Bria-Mobile-Push-Checklist

Bria Mobile 5.3.2

14-day Trial Period references updated.
Bria / Stretto import function fix.

Bria Mobile 5.3.4

Bria Push Service fixes
Favorites can now be sorted
Rejected calls now tracked as incoming
SRTP support enhancement
Additional stability and performance improvements. 

For more on the Bria Push Service, please visit https://support.counterpath.com/hc/en-us/articles/115004151013-Bria-Mobile-Push-Checklist

Bria Mobile 5.3.6

Improve Reachability enhancement for UDP-based accounts.

Bria Push Service improvements

Bria Mobile 5.5.3

NEW Chat Room support. Note, previous group chats will no longer be displayed.

Bria Push Service improvements including startup performance.

Bria Push service improvements.
Additional stability and performance improvements.

Bria Mobile 5.6.1

Chatroom Improvements
You can now invite participants directly into public chatrooms. We've also added distinct notifications for 1:1 and chatroom messages.

We added several new items based on user feedback
We've added support for anonymous calling, converting letters to numbers, disabling call waiting and improved offline vCard behavior.

Bria Mobile is moving to a new solution soon. Bria Mobile is becoming Bria.

Don’t worry, your app will keep working and we’ll still be doing updates.
